com.avaya.ic.sdk
Interface EmailDocument

All Superinterfaces:
Document, EmailMessage
public interface EmailDocument
extends Document, EmailMessage

Represents any email. Used to deliver the contents of an email to the requesting client. From an EmailDocument object, a client can access the contents and the attributes of the email, such as the header, language, body, and attachments. To initiate a new outbound email that is related to the existing email, initiate the draft creation from the EmailDocument. These outbound emails can include reply, forward, and request for information.

createDraft

EmailDraft createDraft(EmailDraft.Type draftType)
Creates a draft of the specified type, and returns an EmailDraft object with prepopulated fields, based on the type context. The creation of a draft of types SYSTEM, NEW_OUTBOUND and QUALITY_ASSURANCE will result in an argument exception. If a draft of the specified type already exists, throws IllegalStateException in Java, InvalidOperationException in C#.

Parameters:
draftType - The type of the draft.
Returns:
The draft created

getDraft

EmailDraft getDraft(EmailDraft.Type draftType)
Returns the draft for the specified email type that is associated with the EmailDocument.

Parameters:
draftType - The type of the draft.
Returns:
A draft for the specified type if it has been created, else null.

Returns:

getAttachment

Returns:
